remarks: For any subset of the base set of an ultrafilter, either the set is in the ultrafilter or the complement is.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
statement: ufilss $p |- ( ( F e. ( UFil ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) -> ( S e. F \/ ( X \ S ) e. F ) ) $.
